# LAPD Central Discord App

> Discord bot for ER:LC LAPD roleplay communities
> Node.js 24 • TypeScript • discord.js v14 • MongoDB • Express

## Documentation

**Read first:** `.github/copilot-instructions.md` - Comprehensive development guide with setup, architecture, conventions, and workflows.

## Critical First Steps

1. **`npm run cp:secrets`** - Creates `Source/Config/Secrets.ts` (REQUIRED before anything else)
2. `npm ci` - Install dependencies
3. `npm start` - Run development server

## Key Conventions

- **PascalCase** for functions/variables (NOT camelCase)
- **CRLF** line endings (Windows)
- **Conventional Commits** for PR titles: `type(scope): description`
- Path aliases (`#Source/*`, `#Utilities/*`) resolve at runtime via Node.js

## Quick Commands

```bash
npm run build       # Compile TypeScript + copy resources
npm run lint        # TypeScript + ESLint + Prettier (~60-120s)
npm test            # Run all tests
```

## Project Structure

```
Source/
├── Commands/       # Discord commands (~73 files)
├── Events/         # Event handlers (~18 files)
├── Models/         # Database schemas (~16 files)
├── Utilities/      # Helpers (104 files, largest section)
├── Resources/      # Static assets
└── Main.ts         # Entry point
```
